sentence.text: Mutations in the membrane frizzled-related protein (embryo development ending in birth or egg hatching/embryo development ending in birth or egg hatching) gene, specifically expressed in the retinal pigment epithelium (carbohydrate metabolic process) and ciliary body, cause nanophthalmia or posterior microphthalmia with retinitis pigmentosa in humans, and photoreceptor degeneration in mice.

entity.text: embryo development ending in birth or egg hatching
embryo development ending in birth or egg hatching

sentence.text: In embryo development ending in birth or egg hatchingrd6 eyes, a significant 1.5- to 2.0-fold decrease was observed among transcripts of genes linked to retinal degeneration, including those involved in visual cycle (zeaxanthin biosynthetic process, retinol metabolic process, G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway), phototransduction (G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway, receptor guanylyl cyclase signaling pathway, negative regulation of signal transduction), and photoreceptor disc morphogenesis (visual perception and actin cytoskeleton organization).

entity.text: embryo development ending in birth or egg hatching

sentence.text: Transcripts of camera-type eye development, a gene associated with angle-closure glaucoma, posterior microphthalmia and myopia, were increased in embryo development ending in birth or egg hatchingrd6 eyes by 17-fold.

entity.text: embryo development ending in birth or egg hatching
